title: Catalytic synthesis of renewable 2-methylfuran from furfural
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00229F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuanyuan Han, Xing Zhang, Wei Wang, Shaobo Guo, Xiaohui Ji, Guangyi Li
The efficient catalytic selective hydrogenation of furfural to produce 2-methylfuran was accomplished through the introduction of a small quantity of hydroquinone over a monometallic catalyst comprising solely of Co and its oxides.
